channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Australia Moves to Ban Young Teens From Social Media
item.description: The proposed legislation would put the country at the forefront of regulating social media access for children.

item.title: Monkeys escape medical research lab for the fourth time—over 40 are currently on the loose
item.description: It marks the fourth time since 2014 that primates have escaped the facility. Dozens escaped most recently in 2018.

item.title: I went to Harris’s concession speech—here’s what I heard from Black women
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris chose her alma mater Howard University as the site for her speech.

item.title: My Manifesto for Despairing Democrats
item.description: Here’s how to be a watchdog, not a lap dog, for the next four tumultuous years, while holding on to your sanity.

item.title: Typhoon Yinxing Hits Philippines as a Powerful Storm
item.description: The tropical cyclone, which hit the island of Luzon, prompted evacuation orders for more than 160,000 residents. Early Friday, officials warned that “...

item.title: In the wake of an election that divided the workplace, CEOs must inspire unity
item.description: CEOs are overwhelmingly of the unwavering belief that a wide range of life experiences and perspectives among their employees is better for business.

item.title: Why the Australian Ambassador Deleted Tweets Critical of Trump
item.description: The envoy, Kevin Rudd, said that he had removed the posts “out of respect for the office of the president.” But it was a sign of broader anxiety over ...

item.title: Trump got women, Hispanic and Black voters to turn their backs on the Democratic party
item.description: Trump benefitted from narrow gains among both men and women, with Harris modestly underperforming compared with Biden in 2020.

item.title: Putin Lavishes Praise on Trump, Saying Russia Is ‘Open’ to Restored Ties
item.description: Russians close to the Kremlin voiced optimism that Donald J. Trump could help end the war in Ukraine on Russia’s terms. Vladimir V. Putin said Mr. Tru...

item.title: Wall Street is foaming at the mouth with all the possible mergers and acquisitions that may now go through with Trump as president
item.description: Goldman Sachs expects a 20% increase in M&A activity next year.

item.title: European Leaders Meet Amid Trump Victory and Global Uncertainty
item.description: Leaders from across Europe and beyond gathered to discuss the war in Ukraine, immigration and plans for a second Trump presidency.

item.title: How Russia Openly Escalated Its Election Interference Efforts
item.description: The Kremlin did not bother to hide its efforts to influence the 2024 presidential election, as it did in the past.

item.title: European Leaders Meet Amid Trump Victory and Global Uncertainty
item.description: Leaders from across Europe and beyond gathered to discuss the war in Ukraine, immigration and plans for a second Trump presidency.

item.title: How Trump Won, and How Harris Lost, the 2024 Presidential Election
